answers.answer: Nothing to with diabetes. Age, menopause and hot flashes come to mind. Try posting on the Menopause forum
Hi I have heard of this phenomenum it is connected with autoimmune and some of the other forums may be able to help you,try the Lyme or Lupus forum.Good Luck

question: Why do my feet get SO hot only at night?  I am NOT diabetic, and healthy in general, tho I am menopausal and on bio-identical hormone therapy for hot flashes.
title: Why are my feet HOT only at night?
